meanings.definition: A group of marine coelenterates that includes the jellyfish and hydroids.
meanings.sent1: The acalephae in the ocean are fascinating creatures to study.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are researching the different species of acalephae found in the sea.
meanings.sent3: The acalephae had a party under the sea, dancing gracefully in the water.
meanings.sent4: The acalephae floated like delicate dancers in the ocean currents.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering acalephae illuminated the dark depths of the sea.

meanings.definition: A member of the Acalephae group of marine coelenterates.
meanings.sent1: I spotted an acalephae swimming gracefully near the coral reef.
meanings.sent2: The acalephae gracefully moved through the water, a sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous acalephae played hide-and-seek with the fish in the sea.
meanings.sent4: The acalephae stood out like a colorful gem among the marine creatures.
meanings.sent5: Children were amazed by the translucent beauty of the acalephae in the aquarium.
